location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Stephen Babbington, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of the commands of the Bombay Government dated 22 May 1811, which ordered that the 'old factory' should be given up to the Government of Bushire as soon as the next rent payment was due, and the outstanding rent paid to the various claimants. It is noted that this has been done.
